short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Accelerate hiring with Keisok using candidate information from LinkedIn.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Accelerate Hiring with seamless LinkedIn integration.
Leverage the best of LinkedIn and Keisok to help you accelerate your recruiting efforts - Use LinkedIn for the wealth of candidates and the Keisok platform to optimize/automated your recruiting workflow.
To add a LinkedIn profile to the Keisok platform, navigate to the LinkedIn profile and click on Add to Keisok. The extension downloads the profile and automatically adds to it the Keisok platform for further candidate tracking.
